TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 低矮薹草 ( 原变种) di ai tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Y. L. Chang & Y. L. Yang.

treatment.description: Leaves soft, 1–1.5 mm wide. Spikes 2 or 3; female spikes 2–4-flowered.
treatment.distribution: Pinus or Xylosma forests, sunny places on mountain slopes; 100–1000 m. Anhui, Liaoning [Japan, Russia; Europe].
